column4: Does anyone know if the 64bit version is pretty stable and works well with flash and the usual stuff now?
beats the heck out of me.  and fedora was disappointing me today as far as that junk goes.  although in fedora's defense that has worked quite well in the past
but really, it's not that hard to throw firefox, flash, java, and whatever into your home directory
not that I'd advise going with that over something simple like apt-get install foo.  but still...
